content.question: If the disk is moving clockwise with an angular speed of <math alttext="5.0 radians per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5.0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mfrac><mrow><mtext>rad</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> with angular acceleration of magnitude <math alttext="1.3 radian per second squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1.3</mn><mtext></mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mfrac><mrow><mtext>rad</mtext></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> . What is the angular speed of the disk three seconds later?

choices.label: <math alttext="1.1 radian per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1.1</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mfrac><mrow><mtext>rad</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="3.9 radians per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>3.9</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mfrac><mrow><mtext>rad</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="5.0 radians per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>5.0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mfrac><mrow><mtext>rad</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="8.9 radians per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>8.9</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mfrac><mrow><mtext>rad</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="16 radians per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>16</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mfrac><mrow><mtext>rad</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="8.9 radians per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>8.9</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mfrac><mrow><mtext>rad</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
